result.markdown:
# ggplot

This page is a demonstration of a ggplot graph rendered in Quarto.



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)

oews_pct <- read_rds("data/oews_pct.rds")

ggplot(oews_pct,
       aes(x = pct_change,
           y = wage,
           fill = wage)) +
  geom_col() +
  geom_text(aes(label = label_percent(accuracy = 0.1)(pct_change),
                color = wage),
            nudge_x = 0.01) +
  labs(title = "Percent change in annual wage by wage percentile",
       subtitle = "Richmond, VA MSA | May 2019 to May 2021",
       caption = "Source: U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics, 
       Occupational Employment and Wage Statistics.") +
  scale_x_continuous(labels = label_percent()) +
  theme(axis.title = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks = element_blank(),
        panel.background = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "none",
        panel.grid.major.x = element_line(color = "grey95",
                                          size = 0.05))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![Percent change in annual wage by wage percentile](ggplot_files/figure-pdf/fig-ggplot-1.pdf){#fig-ggplot fig-pos='H'}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
library(plotly)

oews_pct <- read_rds("data/oews_pct.rds")

oews_bars <- ggplot(oews_pct,
       aes(x = pct_change,
           y = wage,
           fill = wage)) +
  geom_col() +
  geom_text(aes(label = label_percent(accuracy = 0.1)(pct_change),
                color = wage),
            nudge_x = 0.01) +
  labs(title = "Percent change in annual wage by wage percentile",
       subtitle = "Richmond, VA MSA | May 2019 to May 2021",
       caption = "Source: U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics, 
       Occupational Employment and Wage Statistics.") +
  scale_x_continuous(labels = label_percent()) +
  theme(axis.title = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks = element_blank(),
        panel.background = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "none",
        panel.grid.major.x = element_line(color = "grey95",
                                          size = 0.05))

ggplotly(oews_bars)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![Percent change in annual wage by wage percentile](ggplot_files/figure-pdf/fig-plotly-1.pdf){#fig-plotly fig-pos='H'}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
library(ggiraph)

oews_pct <- read_rds("data/oews_pct.rds")

oews_bars <- ggplot(oews_pct,
       aes(x = pct_change,
           y = wage,
           fill = wage)) +
  geom_col() +
  # geom_text(aes(label = label_percent(accuracy = 0.1)(pct_change),
  #               color = wage), nudge_x = 0.01) +
  labs(title = "Percent change in annual wage by wage percentile",
       subtitle = "Richmond, VA MSA | May 2019 to May 2021",
       caption = "Source: U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics, 
       Occupational Employment and Wage Statistics.") +
  scale_x_continuous(labels = label_percent()) +
  theme(axis.title = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks = element_blank(),
        panel.background = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "none",
        panel.grid.major.x = element_line(color = "grey95",
                                          size = 0.05)) +
  geom_col_interactive(aes(data_id = pct_change, tooltip = pct_change),size = 2)

bar <- girafe(ggobj = oews_bars)

bar
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![Percent change in annual wage by wage percentile](ggplot_files/figure-pdf/fig-ggiraph-1.pdf){#fig-ggiraph fig-pos='H'}
:::
:::
